00032 /*! Used to register the CHP reader. */
00033 FusionCHPGenericData::Reg FusionCHPGenericData::reg;
00034 
00035 /*! The class name. */
00036 static AffymetrixGuidType ObjectName = "FusionCHPGenericData";
00037 
00038 /*
00039  * Convert to the CHP pointer.
00040  */
00041 FusionCHPGenericData * FusionCHPGenericData::FromBase(FusionCHPData *chip)
00042 {
00043         if (chip != NULL && chip->GetObjectName() == ObjectName)
00044                 return (FusionCHPGenericData *)chip;
00045         return NULL;
00046 }
00047 
00048 AffymetrixGuidType FusionCHPGenericData::GetObjectName()
00049 {
00050         return ObjectName;
00051 }

00054 {
00055 }
00056 
00057 FusionCHPGenericData::~FusionCHPGenericData()
00058 {
00059         Clear();
00060 }
00061 
00062 /*
00063  * Get the id of the file (only valid for Command Console "calvin" files)
00064  */
00065 AffymetrixGuidType FusionCHPGenericData::FileId()
00066 {
00067         return genericData.FileIdentifier();
00068 }
00069 
00070 /*
00071  * Returns the GenericData object associated with a Calvin file, NULL for GCOS files.
00072  */
00073 GenericData *FusionCHPGenericData::GetGenericData()
00074 {
00075         return &genericData;
00076 }
00077 
00078 bool FusionCHPGenericData::Read()
00079 {
00080         GenericFileReader reader;
00081         try
00082         {
00083                 reader.SetFilename(filename);
00084                 reader.Open(genericData);
00085                 return true;
00086         }
00087         catch(...)
00088         {
00089                 return false;
00090         }
00091 }
00092 
00093 bool FusionCHPGenericData::ReadHeader()
00094 {
00095         return Read();
00096 }
00097 
00098 void FusionCHPGenericData::Clear()
00099 {
00100         genericData.Clear();
00101 }
